news.title: 最新爱泼斯坦文件揭露安德鲁王子更多亲密邮件
news.title0: Latest Epstein revelations dig even deeper hole for Andrew
news.content: 最新披露的爱泼斯坦文件显示，安德鲁王子在2011年仍与爱泼斯坦保持联系，并讨论商业交易，与其公开声明相矛盾。
news.content0: "This week is all about me," wrote the then-Prince Andrew to the sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, in a small, epic statement of a lack of self-awareness.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美商务部长卢特尼克被曝曾计划访问爱泼斯坦岛屿
news.title0: Emails show US Commerce Secretary Lutnick planned Epstein island visit
news.content: 邮件显示，美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克曾于2012年计划携家人访问爱泼斯坦的私人岛屿，与其此前声称已断绝关系的说法相悖。
news.content0: Billionaire businessman and US Commerce Department Secretary Howard Lutnick planned a visit to Jeffrey Epstein's island with his family, emails show - years after Lutnick claimed to have cut off ties with the convicted paedophile.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 以色列寻求伊朗政权更迭，寄望特朗普行动
news.title0: Israel eyes regime change in Iran - and is counting on Trump to make it happen
news.content: 以色列领导人正私下推动美国对伊朗采取旨在实现政权更迭的最大化打击，认为当前是削弱伊朗政权的“黄金时刻”。
news.content0: Amid the din of global speculation over US military build-up in the Middle East, Israel's leaders have remained unusually silent.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 意大利网红村庄限制游客进入著名教堂
news.title0: Italian village restricts access to its Instagram-famous church
news.content: 意大利北部圣马达莱纳村将从五月起限制游客进入其因多洛米蒂山背景而闻名的教堂，以遏制过度旅游。
news.content0: For more than a decade, images of Santa Maddalena, a small village church in northern Italy framed by jagged peaks of the Dolomite Mountains, have circulated online. But locals say it was last summer that the steady stream of visitors became a flood.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 2000年前木乃伊肖像将拍卖，样貌惊人现代
news.title0: 2,000-year-old mummy portrait looks way ahead of its time
news.content: 一幅来自罗马埃及时期、描绘一位有着淡褐色眼睛和灰白头发的男性法尤姆木乃伊肖像将于下周拍卖，其样貌极具现代感。
news.content0: A funerary portrait from Roman Egypt will go up for sale next week, featuring a strikingly modern-looking male subject with piercing hazel eyes and graying hair.
news.author: CNN

news.title: NBA对76人队保罗·乔治禁赛25场
news.title0: NBA hands down 25-game ban to 76ers’ Paul George for violating anti-drug policy
news.content: NBA宣布，费城76人队球星保罗·乔治因违反联盟反毒品计划规定，被处以25场禁赛处罚。
news.content0: Paul George of thePhiladelphia 76ershas been suspended 25 games for violating the terms of the NBA’s anti-drug program, the leagueannouncedSaturday.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 委内瑞拉计划大赦政治犯并关闭臭名昭著监狱
news.title0: Venezuela plans amnesty law for political prisoners and closure of notorious prison
news.content: 委内瑞拉代总统宣布一项大赦法提案，可能导致数百名政治犯获释，并计划关闭一所臭名昭著的拘留中心。
news.content0: Venezuela’s acting president has announced a proposed amnesty law that could lead to the release of hundreds ofpolitical prisoners, as well as the closure of a notorious detention center, in her latest concessions since the US capture of President Nicolas Maduro.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 伊朗发生爆炸引发恐慌，以方否认参与
news.title0: Two explosions reported in Iran - as Israel denies involvement
news.content: 伊朗南部港口城市阿巴斯港和西南部城市阿瓦士发生爆炸，造成人员伤亡。伊朗否认有军事领导人遇袭，以色列否认参与。
news.content0: Two explosions have been reported in Iran as the regime denied a ‌military leader was targeted, amid heightened tension in the region.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 英国皇家海军陆战队暴风雪中营救被困登山者
news.title0: Marines on training exercise rescue stranded climber in freezing conditions on Ben Nevis
news.content: 英国皇家海军陆战队预备役人员在苏格兰本尼维斯山暴风雪训练中，成功营救一名因失温而濒临死亡的被困登山者。
news.content0: Marines on a training exercise saved the life of a stranded climber who had begun to succumb to exposure on Ben Nevis in freezing conditions.
news.author: Sky News
